alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; East Valley; Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek; Tonopah Desert; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 05 at 11:09PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 1145 PM MST... At 1108 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Estrella Mountain Park, or 10 miles southeast of Avondale, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chandler, Avondale, Goodyear, Buckeye, Sun Lakes, Maricopa, Phoenix International Raceway, Bapchule, Estrella Sailport, Olberg, Estrella Mountain Park, Estrella Mountain Ranch, Firebird Lake, Mobile, Rainbow Valley, Ak-Chin Village, Komatke and Santan. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 162 and 180. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 159 and 163. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 30 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
